name: focus-leading-reader
description: Bold leading letters to aid faster reading (MV3 extension).

scripts.zip: python3 -c "import os,zipfile; z=zipfile.ZipFile('focus-leading-reader.zip','w',zipfile.ZIP_DEFLATED); [z.write(os.path.join(r,f), os.path.relpath(os.path.join(r,f), '.')) for r,_,fs in os.walk('.') for f in fs if not r.startswith('./.vscode')]; z.close(); print('focus-leading-reader.zip created')"
